reviewText: It's nice to finally SEE more of these unique B&W paper/art films of the past from H & B. However, I don't understand why they added one of the H&B films from the "Hoffnung" series, especially since it was already issued on the double H&B DVD "So British". Also, while I'm grousing [ha ha] I wished THIS had been a 2 DVD set with more Snip & Snap episodes...... So, will there be ANOTHER Snip & Snap DVD volume 2? I hope so. I'm looking forward to it.
